en_us: Use an everstone to prevent a mob from aging
Collect_Everstones during full moons and use them on baby mobs to stop them from aging! But watch out, some other mobs might start aging, too!
Everstones can prevent mobs from aging.\n\nSome mobs that don't normally age now have the ability to evolve into other mobs.
Everstones can be obtained by mining stone during a full moon.\n\nStone mined with Silk Touch will never drop an everstone.
Dropping an everstone on a mob will prevent it from aging.\n\nZombies, Skeletons, Slimes, Strays, Piglins, Guardians, and Vindicators can evolve under specific conditions.
Zombies will convert to husks after being in direct sunlight in a desert or badlands biome for a long time.
Skeletons will convert into strays after being in a cold, snowy biome for a long time.
Slimes will convert into magma cubes after being in the nether for a long time.
Strays will convert into skeletons if taken out of a cold, snowy biome for a long time.
Piglins inside bastion remnants will convert into piglin brutes if there are less than two brutes nearby.
Guardians will convert into elder guardians after being near several other guardians for a long time.\n\nSpecifically, guardians with five other friends will start to age.
Vindicators will convert into evokers when near at least seven magical blocks for a long time.\n\nThese blocks include enchanting tables, bookshelves, lecterns, brewing stands, and cauldrons.
